title: Project Page Changes for {{ version }}
description: ScratchTools is introducing many new project page and editor features that will revolutionize the way that you use Scratch. You can enable them on the settings page.

changes.slogan: Rotate gradient colors in the paint editor
Align shapes and objects in the paint editor
Quickly center text in your project instructions
Extend C-blocks around code when dragging them
View file sizes for any asset
Use dozens of extra fonts in the paint editor
Temporarily disable cloud variables in projects
Customize the opacity of stage variable monitors
Customize and round lines and shape outlines
Add and view emoji reactions on any project
Record and save videos of your project stage
Unite, subtract, intersect, and exclude shapes
Upload WEBP images as costumes and sprites
